info.name: Furaffinity - Grey Rust
info.description: A primarily grey style with splashes of rusty reds and orange. Simplified design without those harsh borders and fixed navigation bar.
info.additionalInfo: Update: made changes for new folders and submission page gallery view. Some things might revert to FA's orignal theme if further changes are made. Note me if I don't get on it right away, I've been using the beta theme recently. Pick from the options above before installing to customize your experience. Note: You must be using the Classic Dark version of FA. Some things will be unreadable and the wrong color if used with the light theme. If you have any problems, questions, or suggestions send me a Note @ FA(Artex.) or leave a message in the Feedback area below Credits: myself, Zelworks(bolder submission rating borders)

data.title: Specify "Applies to" on section one please
Used for ages, needs to be fixed!

options.label: No Banner
